summary: This is an email from October 18, 2019, providing feedback from victims following a meeting in Miami related to the Epstein case. The feedback indicates victims appreciated being remembered, valued the information and explanations from an AUSA, and expressed a need for counseling.

events.title: Miami Epstein Meeting Feedback
events.description: A meeting was held in Miami for victims of Jeffrey Epstein. Following the meeting, feedback was gathered indicating victims appreciated the meeting, felt valued, and received useful information about the legal process.

keyFacts: A meeting was held in Miami for victims of Jeffrey Epstein.
Multiple victims provided positive feedback, stating they appreciated not being forgotten and felt valued by the meeting.
Victims appreciated the information and explanation of the legal process provided by an AUSA (Assistant United States Attorney).
Some victims who could not attend the meeting shared similar sentiments and expressed a need for counseling.
The email serves as an update to inform executive management of the victim feedback.
